ygData.subject: RE: Has anyone dueled a magician?
ygData.msgSnippet: after that patch, but not recently, i dueled a level 50 enchanter.  i got the message that i could not charm that NPC or whatever, but even though i got the
ygData.messageBody:
after that patch, but not recently, i dueled a level 50 enchanter. i got
the message that i could not charm that NPC or whatever, but even though i
got the message, her pet started beating the crap out of her. she didn't
want to die (though i REALLY wanted to kill her) so i feared her pet away
with 10hp left on her. then i made her zone.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> Actually the reason it did not stick is that a couple of
> months ago they
> patched charm so that you could not charm a pet while the
> summoner is still
> alive.
>
> Rokenn
